main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported over Phoenix, Arizona in May 1952.
interesting points: The first sighting involved a cigar-shaped object with a dull gray color seen by a businessman for about four seconds., On May 13, 1952, two pilots reported an elliptical, silver object estimated to be traveling at 40,000 MPH., A third report described a large brilliant object about 200-300 feet in diameter moving at 600-700 MPH across the sky., Witnesses during another sighting observed two bright lights in V formation for about two minutes., Overall, numerous credible witnesses including military personnel reported encountering various unexplained aerial phenomena.
sighted object: Cigar-shaped and elliptical unidentified aerial objects
witness description: A businessman, two pilots from 78th Fighter Interceptor Squadron, and various civilians.
